progetto.view.commandline

Class CommandLineView

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.AbstractView
      • progetto.view.commandline.CommandLineView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, IExecutible

    public class CommandLineView
extends AbstractView
implements IExecutible, java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    Federica handles everything related to the command live view. handles threading
